title: BTG Pactual taps former central banker Ortiz as Mexico chairman
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
SAO PAULO, Oct 22 (Reuters) - Grupo BTG Pactual SA , Latin America's largest independent investment bank, tapped Guillermo Ortiz to be chair...
